long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Drop the Number: Chrome Extension Edition

Experience the addictive puzzle game, Drop the Number, now available as a Chrome Extension! Test your strategic thinking and number skills in this engaging and challenging game.

Your objective is simple: drop numbered blocks onto the grid and merge them to reach higher numbers. Strategically place the blocks to create lines or groups of the same numbers, causing them to merge and increase in value. Be careful, though, as the grid can quickly fill up, making it harder to find the right spots to drop your blocks.

With each move, new blocks will appear, adding to the challenge. Plan ahead and make calculated decisions to maximize your score. The game ends when the grid is completely filled, so aim to achieve the highest number possible before that happens.

Drop the Number Chrome Extension offers a seamless and convenient way to enjoy the game directly in your browser. Whether you're taking a break from work or simply looking to exercise your brain, this addictive puzzle game will keep you entertained and challenged.

Get ready to drop, merge, and strategize your way to the top of the leaderboard. Install the Drop the Number Chrome Extension now and embark on a thrilling journey of numbers and puzzles. Can you reach the coveted high scores and become a master of Drop the Number?

*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://drivemad.net
